title: Basil Brush: Sports Spectacular 2009
description:
Basil Brush: Sports Spectacular 2009



Like the other Basil Brush DVD, this also brings 3 episodes of the popular Basil Brush show from 2002, it would leave anyone utterly laughing for hours on end as each minute gives off a gag and joke that has anyone falling off the sofa dying with laughter.

The three episodes included are 'Sports Spectacular' where Basil has set up a ultimate training plan for Molly after she worries about sports day and a fierce rival that will do anything to win the day. 'Revenge of the Mummy' is perfect for a tomb raiding after Basil and Stephen find a Ancient Egyptian burial chamber underneath the flat and soon the mummy comes after them. 'Basil's Millions' is perfect when Basil stands to earn 21 gazillion dollars - but also evil Cousin Mortimer also stands to earn the same amount only if the two can get along with each other for 48 hours in the flat without arguments or fights. Perfect for any fan of comedy and children.

My Rip enjoy
